deck:
Over the Bank Holiday weekend a bunch of us spent a wonderful weekend attending 'Devoted'. The weather was 'mixed' to say the least and our shared meal on Saturday was under cover as torrential rain came to add to the general excitement!

The worship led by Lou Fellingham and her band was amazing - spirit filled and prophetic. The day time seminars were thought provoking and inspirational, ranging from studies on Markâ€™s Gospel, workshops on marriage and parenting and an inspiring and challenging set of sessions about living Life in the Spirit. On Saturday night we had some incredible teaching by Tope Koleoso and we learnt about the exciting work of Christ Central churches across the world. The children also had a wonderful time encountering God and having fun in the high quality kids work.

The whole weekend provided a great set of memories, a boost to our walks with God and a lot of food for thought. Thank you to all who made it happen.
title: Devoted Event
